title: Justice Dept. Offers Immunity to Kash Patel for Testimony in Documents Case
description: The adviser, Kash Patel, had previously declined to answer questions from prosecutors in front of a federal grand jury, citing his Fifth Amendment rights.
dc:creator: Michael S. Schmidt and Alan Feuer
media:description: Kash Patel, a close adviser to former President Donald J. Trump, was offered a grant of immunity by prosecutors for his testimony.
